name: R5-ResourceVersionPolicy-R4-ResourceVersionPolicy
title: Concept map to convert a FHIR R5 ResourceVersionPolicy into FHIR R4

element.display: VersionId meta-property is not supported (server) or used (client).

target.display: VersionId meta-property is not supported (server) or used (client).

element.display: VersionId meta-property is supported (server) or used (client).

target.display: VersionId meta-property is supported (server) or used (client).

element.display: Supports version-aware updates (server) or will be specified (If-match header) for updates (client).

target.display: VersionId must be correct for updates (server) or will be specified (If-match header) for updates (client).
